function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Unclear reference to regions and their average age","category":"Disinformation and Misinformation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Infodemics and fake news spreading at an unprecedented speed and reach, making it challenging to find trustworthy sources and reliable information.","category":"Disinformation and Misinformation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cross-sectoral dialogue and collaboration, leading to siloed approaches in public health crisis response.","category":"Communication and ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring the effectiveness of prevention and mitigation measures during a crisis","category":"Health Behaviors and ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Home quarantine creating social and psychological challenges due to long stays at home and isolation","category":"Social and Psychological Effects
